items.title: Verizon's C-band 5G now reaches 230 million people across US
items.snippet: Verizon announced its C-band 5G network now covers 230 million people, achieving 90% of its initial deployment target ahead of schedule.

items.title: Verizon launches 5 Gbps Fios tier, fastest residential service in US
items.snippet: Verizon introduced a new 5 Gbps symmetrical Fios tier for $124.99/month in select markets.
